metaface.interaction
Class Stimulus

java.lang.Object
  metaface.interaction.Stimulus
public class Stimulus
extends Object

This state reoresents a DMTL stimulus element for matching to a user's stimulus.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
InteractionManager
